system.afflictionDescription: This special affliction can only affect one exorcist at once. They permanently gain the agenda item push people away even if losing this affliction. Ask that exorcist the question who in this group will let you down? Any time the chosen person fails an action roll, the afflicted exorcist gains 1 nonlethal stress. However, if this triggered at least once during a session, at the end of that session also gain 1 xp.
